Message CFG-PWR: Description Put receiver in a defined power state.

column2: u-blox 8 / u-blox M8 from protocol version 15 up to version 23.01

Message CFG-PWR: Comment This message is deprecated in protocol versions greater than 17. Use UBX-CFG-RST
for GNSS start/stop and UBX-RXM-PMREQ for software backup.

column2: - version - Message version (1 for this version)
